item.title: Morale plummets at the CDC as staff fear job losses
item.description: Staff at the CDC are bracing for a significant reduction in the work force that appears to be targeting staff with the fewest worker protections.

item.title: Musk's team takes control of key systems at Consumer Financial Protection Bureau
item.description: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is the latest target of Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency.
